name: azure-lock-unlock
description: Apply or Remove locks to your Azure Subscription or Resource group
author: Utkarsh Shigihalli

inputs.name: applyTo
inputs.label: Apply To
inputs.helpMarkDown: Apply the lock to Subscription or Resource group

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure subscription for the key vault

inputs.name: resourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of a resource group.

inputs.name: action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Action to be performed on the selected subscription or resource group.

inputs.name: lockType
inputs.label: Lock type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of the lock you want to apply. [Read more](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-resource-manager/resource-group-lock-resources)

inputs.name: lockName
inputs.label: Lock name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the lock name. If the action is `Remove`, the lock with the specified name will be removed.
